content.text:
# List of presidents of Sri Lanka__disambig_1

}}
The president of Sri Lanka is the elected head of state and the chief executive of Sri Lanka. The president is a dominant political figure in the country. The office was created in 1972, as more of a ceremonial position. It was empowered with executive powers by the 1978 Constitution introduced by J. R. Jayewardene.

TimeAxis   = orientation:horizontal
ScaleMajor = unit:year increment:5 start:1970
ScaleMinor = unit:year increment:1 start:1970
Legend     = columns:1 left:110 top:57 columnwidth:220
Define $today =
TextData =
pos:(20,57) textcolor:black fontsize:s
text:"Political Affiliation:"
BarData =
bar:Gopallawa
bar:Jayewardene
bar:Premadasa
bar:Wijetunga
bar:Kumaratunga
bar:MRajapaksa
bar:Sirisena
bar:GRajapaksa
bar:Wickremesinghe
bar:Dissanayake
PlotData=
width:5 align:left fontsize:s shift:(5,-4) anchor:till
bar:Gopallawa
from: 22/05/1972 till: 04/02/1978 color:ind   text:"William Gopallawa"
bar:Jayewardene
from: 04/02/1978 till: 02/01/1989 color:unp   text:"Junius Richard Jayewardene"
bar:Premadasa
from: 02/01/1989 till :01/05/1993 color:unp   text:"Ranasinghe Premadasa"
bar:Wijetunga
from: 02/05/1993 till: 12/11/1994 color:unp   text:"Dingiri Banda Wijetunga"
bar:Kumaratunga
from: 12/11/1994 till: 19/11/2005 color:slfp  text:"Chandrika Kumaratunga"
bar:MRajapaksa
from: 19/11/2005 till: 09/01/2015 color:slfp  text:"Mahinda Rajapaksa"
bar:Sirisena
from: 09/01/2015 till: 18/11/2019 color:slfp  text:"Maithripala Sirisena"
bar:GRajapaksa
from: 18/11/2019 till: 14/07/2022 color:slpp  text:"Gotabaya Rajapaksa"
bar:Wickremesinghe
from: 14/07/2022 till: 23/09/2024 color:unp   text:"Ranil Wickremesinghe"
bar:Dissanayake
from: 23/09/2024 till: $today color:npp       text:"Anura Kumara Dissanayake"
